Episodes.Title: Brunchsquatch
Episodes.Director: Ian Hamilton, Mauricio Pardo, Bernard Derriman
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Lizzie Molyneux-Logelin
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob decides to serve brunch to compete with Jimmy Pesto; the Belcher kids help Mr. Fischoeder's brother hide from him.

Episodes.Title: The Silence of the Louise
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Gregory Thompson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Louise enlists Millie's help to find the culprit who attacked Mr. Frond's therapy dolls.

Episodes.Title: The Wolf of Wharf Street
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Lizzie Molyneux-Logelin
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: On Halloween night, Linda tries to impress the kids by taking them to look for a wolf that has been terrorizing the town. Meanwhile, an injured and medicated Bob believes that Teddy has turned into a werewolf.

Episodes.Title: Sit Me Baby One More Time
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Nora Smith
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina starts a babysitting franchise that goes off the rails when Tammy is hired to work with her.

Episodes.Title: Thanks-hoarding
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Jon Schroeder
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: The Belchers discover that Teddy is a secret hoarder when they reluctantly agree to pitch in for Thanksgiving with his family.

Episodes.Title: The Bleakening
Episodes.Director: Bernard Derriman, Brian LoSchiavo, Chris Song
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Steven Davis
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Linda wants to add some extra cheer to the holidays by throwing a holiday party. After her ornaments are stolen, Linda interrogates her guests. The children think it was "The Bleaken".

Episodes.Title: V for Valentine-detta
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Lizzie Molyneux-Logelin
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina has a rough break up on Valentine's Day, so Linda and Louise take her on a girls' night out, while Bob and Gene have a trapeze experience that brings them closer.

Episodes.Title: Y Tu Ga-Ga Tambien
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Scott Jacobson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Gene disapproves of a new playground game; Linda fills in for the local library storyteller.

Episodes.Title: The Secret Ceramics Room of Secrets
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Dan Fybel
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: The kids are tasked with giving their grandma homemade gifts for her birthday and set out to find a secret ceramics room that, according to urban legend, has been boarded up for years.

Episodes.Title: Sleeping with the Frenemy
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Gregory Thompson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina allows Tammy to stay with the Belchers during Spring Break and fixes her up with a boy from out of town.

Episodes.Title: The Hurt Soccer
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Rachel Hastings
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: The Belchers sign Louise up for a soccer league and must help her train for the last game of the season.

Episodes.Title: Cheer Up Sleepy Gene
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Holly Schlesinger
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Gene is nervous about going to his first sleepover and realizes he had a right to be when things don't go as planned.

Episodes.Title: The Trouble with Doubles
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Holly Schlesinger
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob and Linda get trapped in an Escape Room while on a double date with another couple. Meanwhile, Louise hosts a zombie-movie night, but Tina takes charge when the zombies prove to be too scary.

Episodes.Title: Go Tina on the Mountain
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Rich Rinaldi
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina befriends a hermit living in the woods when she, Gene and Louise go to Outdoor Education; Bob and Linda see what it's like to be empty-nesters.

Episodes.Title: Are You There Bob? It's Me, Birthday
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Kelvin Yu
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Linda and the kids try to put together a last-minute surprise party when they forget Bob's birthday, but to do so, Linda asks Hugo to take Bob with him on his restaurant health inspections.

Episodes.Title: Boywatch
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Rich Rinaldi
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina joins the Junior Lifeguards, but she struggles with the training, prompting one of her fellow junior guards to try and make her quit.

Episodes.Title: As I Walk Through the Alley of the Shadow of Ramps
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Scott Jacobson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Louise gets into a turf war with a juice truck owner trying to set up shop in the Belcher's alley; Linda realizes she can't always come to her sister's defense.

Episodes.Title: Mo Mommy Mo Problems
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Steven Davis
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: On Mother's Day, the Belchers wind up in a real estate scheme when attend open houses for free food and Linda meets a charming real estate agent.

Episodes.Title: Mission Impos-Slug-Ble
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Nora Smith
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Louise devises a plan to get her extensive Burobu card collection back after it's confiscated at school.

Episodes.Title: Something Old, Something New, Something Bob Caters for You
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Jon Schroeder
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: The Belchers cater a wedding for a couple who fell in love at the restaurant.
